column1: 1 Total Gross Public Expenditure on Development 2005/06 - 2009/10

1. In this edition of SID, pensions have been moved from the DFID programme to non-DFID expenditure (see Table 2). This change has been applied retrospectively. The means that the breakdown of GPEX is now consistent with the classification of spending under DEL agreed with the Treasury.
2. Section 2 shows a reconcilation of 2009/10 GPEX to 2009/10 ODA.
